    CodeDisplay
    1399pT0: No evidence of primary tumor
    1400pTis: Carcinoma in situ
    1401pT3: Mucosal disease
    1402pT4a: Moderately advanced disease. Tumor involving deep soft tissue, cartilage, bone, or overlying skin
    1403pT4b: Very advanced disease. Tumor involving brain, dura, skull base, lower cranial nerves (IX, X, XI, XII), masticator space, carotid artery, prevertebral space, or mediastinal structures
